mapper.select: select count(CHANGEDATE) from POINT where CHANGEDATE=sysdate and NICKNAME=#{nickname}
select CHANGEDATE, CHANGEWHY, CHANGEPOINT from POINT where NICKNAME=#{nickname} and CHANGEDATE>= sysdate-30 order by CHANGEDATE desc
select CHANGEDATE from POINT where CHANGEDATE >= (select add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'mm'),0) from dual) and CHANGEDATE < last_day(sysdate) and NICKNAME = #{nickname};
